sources.title: Gold Fools | Full Adventure Movie
sources.description:
Gold Fools -  When a successful family man gets laid off, he leads his friends on a gold panning expedition in the mountains of Sonora, oblivious to what lurks where the water runs real deep.
2012.  Stars: Kalos Cluff, Travis Cluff, Vince Cosentino
